scripts.local:test:integration:without-docker: npm run local:wait-for-rabbitmq && NODE_DEBUG=test node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' --test "**/*.test.integration.ts"
scripts.local:wait-for-rabbitmq: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' ../../infrastructure/scripts/rabbitMq/waitForRabbitMq.ts
scripts.pipeline:github:rabbitmq:docker:up: RABBITMQ_PORT=5672 RABBITMQ_MANAGEMENT_PORT=15672 docker compose -f ../../infrastructure/podman/testing/compose.yml -p test up -d rabbitmq
scripts.pipeline:github:test:integration: npm run pipeline:github:wait-for-rabbitmq && RABBITMQ_HOST=rabbitmq NODE_DEBUG=test node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' --test "**/*.test.integration.ts"

scripts.pipeline:wait-for-rabbitmq: RABBITMQ_HOST=connector_common_integration_tests-rabbitmq-1 RABBITMQ_PORT=5672 node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' ../../infrastructure/scripts/rabbitMq/waitForRabbitMq.ts
scripts.test:integration:rabbitmq:docker:up: RABBITMQ_PORT=5677 RABBITMQ_MANAGEMENT_PORT=15677 docker compose -f ../../infrastructure/podman/testing/compose.yml -p connector_common_integration_tests up -d rabbitmq
scripts.test:integration:run: npm run test:integration:rabbitmq:docker:up && npm run wait-for-rabbitmq && RABBITMQ_HOST=rabbitmq RABBITMQ_PORT=5677 NODE_DEBUG=test node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' --test "**/*.test.integration.ts" && npm run test:integration:rabbitmq:docker:down
scripts.test:unit:node-runner: NODE_DEBUG=test node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' --test "**/*.test.ts"
